name: LGST 175
title: Human Rights
description: Embraces an interdisciplinary approach to the study of human rights. Captures the malleable nature of human rights and the contours of its dual role as both law and discourse.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to legal studies and politics majors during first and second pass enrollment. Prior coursework in International Law (POLI 160B / LGST 160B) is recommended.
